message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for your needs.  Given its value, I'm offering it to you at a price of $20,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm a bit of a budget buyer, and I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. Let's meet in the middle â€“ how about $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's as high as I can go.
